file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-12-05-04 - LH AFT CONSOLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LH AFT CONSOLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the LH aft console. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-12-05-000-801-A LH AFT CONSOLE - REMOVAL ALL 25-12-05-400-801-A LH AFT CONSOLE - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-12-05 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LH AFT CONSOLE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the LH aft console. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-24-02-000-801-A/400 CMU PRINTER - REMOVAL AMM TASK 31-17-01-000-801-A/400 MAINTENANCE PANEL - REMOVAL C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit LH I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) For aircraft with CMU printer installed on the LH aft console, remove it ( AMM TASK 23-24-02-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the maintenance panel (3) ( AMM TASK 31-17-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Remove the screws (2) that attach the console (1). (3) Remove the LH aft console (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-05 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL LH Aft Console - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 224 3. MAINTENANCE PANEL DET. A B 2. SCREW 1. LH AFT CONSOLE LINING 2. SCREW C 2. SCREW DET. B 2. SCREW DET. C 145AMM250005.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-05 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. LH AFT CONSOLE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the LH aft console. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-24-02-400-801-A/400 CMU PRINTER - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 31-17-01-400-801-A/400 MAINTENANCE PANEL - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit LH I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the LH aft console (1) in the installation position. (2) Attach it with the screws (2). (3) Install the maintenance panel (3) ( AMM TASK 31-17-01-400-801-A/400). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) If you removed the CMU printer installed on the LH aft console, install it again ( AMM TASK 23-24-02-400-801-A/400).
